/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. In the foreground, trees and bushes add a touch of greenery to the urban setting. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, which shines brightly in the top left corner, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
